Description: Dialog with a Greeting turn and text input turns

ExpectedResponses.text:
What can I help you with today?
Say something like "Book a flight from Paris to Berlin on March 22, 2020"
ExpectedResponses.speak:
What can I help you with today?
Say something like "Book a flight from Paris to Berlin on March 22, 2020"

Turns.Utterance: Book my flight from Seattle to New York on Feb 10,2020

ExpectedResponses.text: Please confirm, I have you traveling to: New York from: Seattle on: 2020-02-10. Is this correct? (1) Yes or (2) No
ExpectedResponses.speak: Please confirm, I have you traveling to: New York from: Seattle on: 2020-02-10. Is this correct?

ExpectedResponses.text: I have you booked to New York from Seattle on 10th February 2020
ExpectedResponses.speak: I have you booked to New York from Seattle on 10th February 2020

ExpectedResponses.text: What else can I do for you?
ExpectedResponses.speak: What else can I do for you?
